spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant you Elemental Whirl, increasing your Critical Strike, Haste, Mastery, or Versatility by 228 for 10 sec.
Your secondary stats are all increased by 54.
While Bladestorming, every 0.7 sec you gain 5% movement speed and 69 Strength, stacking. Lasts 6 sec.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description:
Blast your target with a ball of concentrated flame, dealing 154 Fire damage to an enemy or healing an ally for 154, then burn the target for an additional 75% of the damage or healing done over 6 sec.

Each cast of Concentrated Flame deals 100% increased damage or healing. This bonus resets after every third cast.
Max 2 Charges.

passive_spell_tooltip.description: Your spells and abilities have a chance to cauterize your target for 398 Fire damage over 10 sec or to heal an ally for 398 over 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Your movement speed is increased by 5%, and when you move more than 25 yds within 4 sec, gain 8 Strength for 20 sec.

This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Versatility by 1 for 14 sec, stacking up to 8 times. Being the vicitim of a loss of control or movement impairing effect also grants a stack of Strife.

Your critical strikes with spells and abilities grant a stack of Blood-Soaked, increasing Critical Strike by 1. Upon reaching 40 stacks, you gain 22 Haste for 8 sec.

Blood-Soaked has a 25% chance of only consuming 30 stacks.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant 54 critical strike rating for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
Your primary stat is increased by 88 while you are above 50% health. You take 15% increased damage while below 20% health.
When Recklessness expires, your Critical Strike is increased by 216 for 5 sec. Your auto attacks will refresh the duration of this effect.
Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant you Elemental Whirl, increasing your Critical Strike, Haste, Mastery, or Versatility by 238 for 10 sec.
Your secondary stats are all increased by 56.
While Bladestorming, every 0.7 sec you gain 5% movement speed and 72 Strength, stacking. Lasts 6 sec.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to start a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of Rampage by 2%, stacking up to 10 times.
Rampage has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!

(4) Set: When you gain a stack of Winning Streak! you have an even chance to either cause your next Bloodthirst to deal 15% increased damage and have 25% increased chance to critically strike or cause your next Raging Blow to deal 15% increased damage and generate 2 additional Rage.

name: Test Subject's Clasps
description: Don't take 'em off - might need to identify your body.

effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to start a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of Rampage by 2%, stacking up to 10 times.
Rampage has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!

(4) Set: When you gain a stack of Winning Streak! you have an even chance to either cause your next Bloodthirst to deal 15% increased damage and have 25% increased chance to critically strike or cause your next Raging Blow to deal 15% increased damage and generate 2 additional Rage.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Writhing Ringworm
description: Is it alive? Maybe. Is it fashionable? ...Maybe.

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful melee abilities have a chance to Gnash your target dealing 120,613 Physical damage. Every third Gnash on the same target does additional damage based on targets missing health. Count is reset if Gnash hits a different target.
Use: Increases your Mastery by 6,531 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 2,445 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
